name: Swordpoint
description:
Swordpoint is a simple top-down arena fighting game where the player can control their weapon by moving the mouse. Try to survive against ever increasing hordes of undead for as long as you can. Use coins earned by playing to buy new weapons and outfits.

The game was made mainly to test the mechanic of moving the player's weapon with the mouse in a physics environment.

Most of the sound effects are from https://www.zapsplat.com
